DELETE /organizations/{organization_id}.description:
Delete an organization. The organization MUST be empty before deleting.
It must not contain any sub-organizations, accounts, members or users. (Currently in Closed Beta - see https://developers.cloudflare.com/fundamentals/organizations/)

parameters.description: The ID of the organization to delete.
parameters.name: organization_id

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtime/kit/.description: Returns day-wise session and recording analytics data of an App for the specified time range start_date to end_date. If start_date and end_date are not provided, the default time range is set from 30 days ago to the current date.

parameters.description: start date in YYYY-MM-DD format
parameters.name: start_date

parameters.description: end date in YYYY-MM-DD format
parameters.name: end_date

recording_stats.description: Recording statistics of an App during the range specified

total_recording_minutes.description: Total recording minutes for a specific day

total_recordings.description: Total number of recordings for a specific day

recording_count.description: Total number of recordings during the range specified

recording_minutes_consumed.description: Total recording minutes during the range specified

session_stats.description: Session statistics of an App during the range specified

total_session_minutes.description: Total session minutes for a specific day

total_sessions.description: Total number of sessions for a specific day

sessions_count.description: Total number of sessions during the range specified

sessions_minutes_consumed.description: Total session minutes during the range specified

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtime/kit/.summary: Fetch day-wise session and recording analytics data for an App

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/o.description: Returns App details of all the users.

parameters.description: Number of values to return in a single page. Default value is 25.
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: The page number to return. Default value is 1.
parameters.name: page_no

name.description: Must be a unique organization name

error.description: Object containing details of the error that occurred

success.description: Whether the operation succeeded or not

error.description: Object containing details of the error that occurred

success.description: Whether the operation succeeded or not

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/o.summary: Fetch App details of all users

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/o.description: Returns organization details for the given organization ID. The user must be the organization's owner.

parameters.description: ID of the organization
parameters.name: org_id

name.description: Must be a unique organization name

error.description: Object containing details of the error that occurred

success.description: Whether the operation succeeded or not

error.description: Object containing details of the error that occurred

success.description: Whether the operation succeeded or not

401.description: User is not authorized to perform this operation.

GET /organizations.description: Retrieve a list of organizations a particular user has access to. (Currently in Closed Beta - see https://developers.cloudflare.com/fundamentals/organizations/)

parameters.description:
Only return organizations with the specified IDs (ex. id=foo&id=bar). Send multiple elements
by repeating the query value.
parameters.name: id

parameters.description:
(case-sensitive) Filter the list of organizations to where the name is equal to a
particular string.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description:
(case-insensitive) Filter the list of organizations to where the name starts with a
particular string.
parameters.name: name.startsWith

parameters.description:
(case-insensitive) Filter the list of organizations to where the name ends with a particular
string.
parameters.name: name.endsWith

parameters.description:
(case-insensitive) Filter the list of organizations to where the name contains a particular
string.
parameters.name: name.contains

parameters.description:
Filter the list of organizations to the ones that contain this particular
account.
parameters.name: containing.account

parameters.description:
Filter the list of organizations to the ones that contain this particular
user.

IMPORTANT: Just because an organization "contains" a user is not a
representation of any authorization or privilege to manage any resources
therein. An organization "containing" a user simply means the user is managed by
that organization.
parameters.name: containing.user

parameters.description:
Filter the list of organizations to the ones that contain this particular
organization.
parameters.name: containing.organization

parameters.description:
Filter the list of organizations to the ones that are a sub-organization
of the specified organization.

"null" is a valid value to provide for this parameter. It means "where
an organization has no parent (i.e. it is a 'root' organization)."
parameters.name: parent.id

parameters.description:
An opaque token returned from the last list response that when
provided will retrieve the next page.

Parameters used to filter the retrieved list must remain in subsequent
requests with a page token.
parameters.name: page_token

parameters.description: The amount of items to return. Defaults to 10.
parameters.name: page_size

items.description: References an Organization in the Cloudflare data model.

next_page_token.description:
Use this opaque token in the next request to retrieve the
next page.

Parameters used to filter the retrieved list must remain in subsequent
requests with a page token.

total_size.description: Counts the total amount of items in a list with the applied filters. The API omits next_page_token to indicate no more items in a particular list.

GET /organizations.summary: List organizations the user has access to

GET /organizations/{organization_id}.description: Retrieve the details of a certain organization. (Currently in Closed Beta - see https://developers.cloudflare.com/fundamentals/organizations/)

parameters.description: The ID of the organization to retrieve.
parameters.name: organization_id

result.description: References an Organization in the Cloudflare data model.

GET /organizations/{organization_id}/acc.description: Retrieve a list of accounts that belong to a specific organization. (Currently in Closed Beta - see https://developers.cloudflare.com/fundamentals/organizations/)

parameters.description: The ID of the organization to retrieve a list of accounts for.
parameters.name: organization_id

parameters.description:
(case-insensitive) Filter the list of accounts to where the account_pubname is equal to
a particular string.
parameters.name: account_pubname

parameters.description:
(case-insensitive) Filter the list of accounts to where the account_pubname starts with
a particular string.
parameters.name: account_pubname.startsWith

parameters.description:
(case-insensitive) Filter the list of accounts to where the account_pubname ends with
a particular string.
parameters.name: account_pubname.endsWith

parameters.description:
(case-insensitive) Filter the list of accounts to where the account_pubname contains
a particular string.
parameters.name: account_pubname.contains

parameters.description:
(case-insensitive) Filter the list of accounts to where the name is equal to a
particular string.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description:
(case-insensitive) Filter the list of accounts to where the name starts with a
particular string.
parameters.name: name.startsWith

parameters.description:
(case-insensitive) Filter the list of accounts to where the name ends with a particular
string.
parameters.name: name.endsWith

parameters.description:
(case-insensitive) Filter the list of accounts to where the name contains a particular
string.
parameters.name: name.contains

parameters.description:
An opaque token returned from the last list response that when
provided will retrieve the next page.

Parameters used to filter the retrieved list must remain in subsequent
requests with a page token.
parameters.name: page_token

parameters.description: The amount of items to return. Defaults to 10.
parameters.name: page_size

next_page_token.description:
Use this opaque token in the next request to retrieve the
next page.

Parameters used to filter the retrieved list must remain in subsequent
requests with a page token.

total_size.description: Counts the total amount of items in a list with the applied filters. The API omits next_page_token to indicate no more items in a particular list.

GET /organizations/{organization_id}/pro.description: Get an organizations profile if it exists. (Currently in Closed Beta - see https://developers.cloudflare.com/fundamentals/organizations/)

parameters.description: The ID of the organization to retrieve a profile for.
parameters.name: organization_id

PUT /organizations/{organization_id}.description: Modify organization. (Currently in Closed Beta - see https://developers.cloudflare.com/fundamentals/organizations/)

parameters.description: The ID of the organization to modify.
parameters.name: organization_id

schema.description: References an Organization in the Cloudflare data model.

requestBody.description:
The new details of the organization. Only accepts updates
to "name" currently.

result.description: References an Organization in the Cloudflare data model.

PUT /organizations/{organization_id}/pro.description: Modify organization profile. (Currently in Closed Beta - see https://developers.cloudflare.com/fundamentals/organizations/)
